text: Get Out Your Handkerchiefs () is a 1978 French Belgian romantic comedy movie directed by Bertrand Blier and starring Gérard Depardieu, Patrick Dewaere, Carole Laure, Michel Serrault, Eléonore Hirt, Sylvie Joly. It was distributed by New Line Cinema and won an Academy Award in 1979. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 romantic comedy movies Category:French romance movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Belgian romance movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Bertrand Blier
title: Get Out Your Handkerchiefs
